urlText: Leichhardt North lift out of service.
content: The lift at Leichhardt North light rail stop towards Dulwich Hill is out of service. Do not use if the doors open. The closest lift access is at Lilyfield Light Rail stop.
subtitle: Leichhardt North lift out of service.

properties.smsText: Leichhardt North lift out of service.
